description.value: Code system of concepts specifying the admission status for the diagnosis related group (DRG) determination. US Realm. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the DRG segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0759 (Status Admission)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

display.value: Admission status is valid; used for grouping

definition.value: Admission status is valid; used for grouping

display.value: Admission status is valid; not used for grouping

definition.value: Admission status is valid; not used for grouping

display.value: Admission status is invalid; not used for grouping

definition.value: Admission status is invalid; not used for grouping

display.value: Admission status is invalid; default value used for grouping

definition.value: Admission status is invalid; default value used for grouping
